definition: (located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: I don't know if they enjoy it.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道他們是否樂在其中。

sentences.english: Daring, spirited and entertaining, he brought smiles to the faces of spectators the world over.
sentences.chinese: 勇敢好鬥，觀賞性強，他使全世界的觀衆樂在其中。

sentences.english: I felt pretty decent coming out of the swim, which I was happy with.
sentences.chinese: 當我結束這段樂在其中的游泳上岸時，感覺相當好。

sentences.english: "It is equally delightful to come from afar and make new friends here in China".
sentences.chinese: 我們自遠方來，在中國結交朋友，同樣樂在其中。

sentences.english: And the bad guys seem jazzed by their evildoing.
sentences.chinese: 壞傢伙們似乎對他們的惡行樂在其中。

sentences.english: Enjoy it, and enjoy being apart from time and space.
sentences.chinese: 樂在其中，樂在空與時以外。

sentences.english: Find an interest you share and indulge it together.
sentences.chinese: 找到你們共同的愛好並一起樂在其中。

sentences.english: If you want it and enjoy it, let that be enough.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想要而且樂在其中，那就讓自己滿足。

sentences.english: Again the visitors were supposed to enjoy themselves in such an indoor literati garden.
sentences.chinese: 在同樣的室內文人花園，觀者樂在其中。

sentences.english: Work elbow, and strong ability to learn and have fun doing it.
sentences.chinese: 工作上手快，再學習能力強，並樂在其中。

definition: to find amusement in one's own way/to enjoy oneself quietly
to feel happy/to rejoice/to have a great time/to make fun of sb
to strive one's hardest/to spare no effort
to feel embarrassed or awkward/to make things difficult (for someone)/to find things difficult (to do or manage)
to expend a great deal of effort
to be willing to do sth/to be ready to do sth/to be happy to do sth/content/satisfied
to enjoy sth and never tire of it (idiom)
have no way out/have no alternative/abbr. to 無奈|无奈[wu2 nai4]
